Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-35195 affecting package tensorflow for versions less than 2.16.1-8
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-35195 affecting package tensorflow for versions less than 2.16.1-8. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package tensorflow is earlier than 2.16.1-8, affected by CVE-2024-35195
